name: Sam
text: Welcome to the UCLA Medical Center.^9 Let's go over treating patients.

name: Luke
text: Patients are brought into the beds in the bottom left.^9 You can click and drag them to the treatment beds in the top right, and then assign doctors and/or nurses to care for them.^9 Minor patients can be attended to by just a single nurse --^9 here's one now.^9 Assign a nurse to a bed and move the patient to the same bed.
